direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check for the presence of an element in the map, but one checks for a key and the other for a value.
Both methods involve iterating through the buckets and nodes to find a specific element, but get returns the value associated with a key.
Both methods access and manipulate the map's internal structure, specifically the buckets and nodes, but remove also modifies the structure by removing an entry.
Both methods depend on the internal structure of the map and modify it, but put adds a new entry while containsValue only checks for an existing value.
Both methods involve synchronization and iteration over the buckets, but clear removes all entries while containsValue checks for a specific value.
